arabicText: قُلْ هَـٰذِهِۦ سَبِيلِىٓ أَدْعُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ ۚ عَلَىٰ بَصِيرَةٍ أَنَا۠ وَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَنِى ۖ وَسُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Proclaim,	“This	is	my	path	- I	call	towards	
Allah;	I,	and	whoever	follows	me,	are	upon	
perception;	and	Purity	is	to	Allah - and	I	am	
not	of	the	polytheists.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo	yeh	meri	rāh	hai	maiñ	Allāh	ki	
țaraf	 bulātā	 hooñ	 maiñ	 aur	 jo	 mere	
qadmoñ	par	chaleñ	dil	ki	āankheñ	rakhte	
haiñ	aur	Allāh	ko	pāki	hai	aur	maiñ	sharik	
karne	wālā	nahiñ

arabicText: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَا مِن قَبْلِكَ إِلَّا رِجَالًۭا نُّوحِىٓ إِلَيْهِم مِّنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْقُرَىٰٓ ۗ أَفَلَمْ يَسِيرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَيَنظُرُوا۟ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۗ وَلَدَارُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ خَيْرٌۭ لِّلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ ۗ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 all	 the	 Noble	 Messengers	 We	 sent	
before	 you,	 were	 exclusively	 men	 -
towards	 whom	 We	 sent	 the	 divine	
revelations,	 and	 were	 dwellers	 of	
townships;	 so	 have	 not	 these	 people	
travelled	in	the	land	and	seen	what	sort	of	
fate	 befell	 those	 before them?	 And	
undoubtedly	the	abode	of	the	Hereafter	is	
better	 for	 the	 pious;	 so	 do	 you	 not	 have	
sense?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	ham	ne	tum	se	pahle	jitne	Rasool bheje	
sab	mard	hi	the	jinheiñ	ham	waḥi	karte	aur	
sab	shaher	ke	sākin	the	to	kyā	yeh	log	zameen	meiñ	chale	nahiñ	to	dekhte	in	se	pahloñ	kā	kyā	
anjām	huā	aur	be-shak		āakhirat		kā	ghar	parhez-gāroñ	ke	liye	behtar	to	kyā	tumheiñ áql	nahiñ

arabicText: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا ٱسْتَيْـَٔسَ ٱلرُّسُلُ وَظَنُّوٓا۟ أَنَّهُمْ قَدْ كُذِبُوا۟ جَآءَهُمْ نَصْرُنَا فَنُجِّىَ مَن نَّشَآءُ ۖ وَلَا يُرَدُّ بَأْسُنَا عَنِ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
To	the	extent	that	when	the	Noble	Messengers	lost	hope	from	the	visible	means,	and	the	people	
thought	that	they	had	spoken	wrongly,	Our	help	came	to	them	- therefore	whoever	We	willed	
was	saved;	and	Our	punishment	is	never	averted	from	the	guilty.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yahāñ	tak	ke	jab	Rasooloñ	ko	z	āhiri	asbāb	ki	ummid	na	rahi	aur	log	samjhe	ke	Rasooloñ ne	un	se	
ghalaț	kahā	thā	us	waqt	hamāri	madad	āayi	to	jise	ham	ne	chāhā	bachā	liya	gayā	aur	hamārā	 áƶāb	
mujrim	logoñ	se	pherā	nahi	jātā.

arabicText: لَقَدْ كَانَ فِى قَصَصِهِمْ عِبْرَةٌۭ لِّأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ ۗ مَا كَانَ حَدِيثًۭا يُفْتَرَىٰ وَلَـٰكِن تَصْدِيقَ ٱلَّذِى بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ وَتَفْصِيلَ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ وَهُدًۭى وَرَحْمَةًۭ لِّقَوْمٍۢ يُؤْمِنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	in	their	tidings	is	enlightenment	 for	the	men	of	understanding;	this	(the	Qur’an)	is	not	
some	made	up	story	but	a	confirmation	of	the	Books	before	it,	and a	detailed	explanation	of	all	
things,	and	a	guidance	and	a	mercy	for	the	Muslims.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak		un	ki	khabroñ	se	aqlmandoñ	ki	āañkheiñ	khulti	haiñ	yeh	koi	banāwat	ki	bāt	nahiñ	lekin	
apne	 se	 agle	 kāmoñ	 ki	tasdiq	 hai	 aur	 har	 cheez	 kā	 mufassal	 bayān	 aur	 Musalmānoñ	 ke	 liye	
Hidāyat-o-Rahmat.
